sentences.pinyin: zhè shì yī gè dà qū yù.

sentences.simplifiedText: 考虑到该区域的多样性，我们需要为每个子区域制定特定的规划。
sentences.traditionalText: 考慮到該區域的多樣性，我們需要為每個子區域制定特定的規劃。
sentences.pinyin: kǎo lǜ dào gāi qū yù de duō yàng xìng, wǒ men xū yào wèi měi gè zǐ qū yù zhì dìng tè dìng de guī huà.
sentences.translation: Considering the diversity of the area, we need to make specific plans for each sub-area.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然这个区域经济条件较差，但人们都非常友好。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然這個區域經濟條件較差，但人們都非常友好。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán zhège qūyù jīngjì tiáojiàn jiào chà, dàn rénmen dōu fēicháng yǒuhǎo.
sentences.translation: Although the economic conditions in this district are poor, the people are very friendly.
